node.name: Waves1D_cellnoise
node.author: Pixar
node.help: Generates one-dimensional wave-like patterns. Patterns ranging from linear to circular can be obtained through the use of the Domain parameter.

property.name: domain
property.help: The dimension along which the waves travel. Use this parameter to obtain circular/spherical patterns (Radius) as well as radial patterns (Angle...). This parameter can be used in conjuction with Surface Point to trade off between 2D and 3D shapes. For example, if you use ST wich Radius, you'll get cylinders of patterns. If you use Surface Point, you'll get spherical patterns. 'nuff said?

property.name: min
property.help: The result is scaled to fit between Min and Max.

property.name: max
property.help: The result is scaled to fit between Min and Max.
